value.title: Why Cultural Competence and Emotional Intelligence Go Hand in Hand
value.excerpt: Ritu Bhasin discusses why it's so important for leaders to develop a cultural lens and how this ties back to emotional intelligence.  - - - - -   bhasin consulting inc. (bci) is a world-renowned full-service diversity, equity and inclusion consulting firm dedicated to driving organizational change. We

value.title: Millennials & Inclusion: Applying an Intersectionality Lens
value.excerpt: We’re often told that Millennials possess certain traits, but the generalizations made about Millennials represent a homogeneous cross-section — that is, Millennials who belong to the dominant culture.   In this video, DEI expert Ritu Bhasin discusses intersectionality and how applying an intersectionality
